mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.member_no_login AS memberNoLogin, c.content AS content, c.updated_at AS updatedAt, a.member_nick AS memberNick, a.member_img AS memberImg FROM community_comment c LEFT JOIN member a ON a.member_no_login = c.member_no_login WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.updated_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_comment (post_id, member_no_login, content, updated_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{memberNoLogin}, #{content}, NOW())
